import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-landing-page', templateUrl: './landing-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./landing-page.component.css'] }) export class LandingPageComponent { } Edward-V-Hotel

Welcome to Edward-V-Hotel

Your luxury hotel stay awaits you!

Book Now

About Us

Edward-V-Hotel is a luxury hotel located in the heart of the city. We offer a variety of rooms and suites to fit every need, along with exceptional dining options and top-notch amenities. Whether you're in town for business or pleasure, our friendly staff is here to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.

Our Rooms

We offer a wide range of rooms and suites to fit every budget and preference. From cozy single rooms to spacious suites with stunning city views, we have something for everyone. All of our rooms are beautifully decorated and equipped with top-of-the-line amenities to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.

Make a Reservation

Ready to book your stay at Edward-V-Hotel? Simply use our online booking system to find the perfect room for your needs and make your reservation. We look forward to welcoming you!

Book Now
